synopsis: In the breathtaking realm of Project Echo, renowned scientist Dr. Evelyn Porter transcends physical boundaries, only to find herself entangled in a digital labyrinth filled with secrets, sabotage, and forgotten souls. With her consciousness merging with a mysterious duo – fellow scientist Anya Reyes and the enigmatic guide Adrian – Evelyn races against time to reveal the truth about Project Echo and save her friends, while uncovering the hidden perils that threaten humanity itself.
